WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
In one cell (D8) i write simple formula "=D6+D7"
When i add 10 rows in table above D8 cell, formula changed to "=D16+D16"
Â 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.0 from SVN 28914

Comments.Message:
When taking a formula such as =D6+D7 and inserting a row above, the reference helper updateFormulaReferences() method was adjusting each cell reference in turn.
In this example, D6 was being incremented first to give =D7+D7, then D7 was being incremented to give =D8+D8

To fix this, ensured that all cell references are adjusted in reverse order, so D7 would always be adjusted before D6 giving =D6+D8 and then =D7+D8

Code has been updated and will be updated in SVN tonight
